On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Richard

 Jay & Concord

⏲ 1:10 p.m. on Wednesday, July 17

What are you doing today?

I'm waiting for my wife who has a 12:30 appointment in this building over there. Then we're going to go home we’ll cook some dinner.

What time did you wake up?

Oh man, I woke up at 5:30 this morning.

Is that when you leave for work?

Well, that's when I head out of the house.

Where do you live?

We live out by Coney Island. We took the subway here today.

What is your favorite part of the day?

12 noon. That’s when I go to prayer at the church over on Fulton. I like it. It keeps me focused and away from the shenanigans in the street.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
